title: What project can I design and develop as an instructional material or technology based instructional material which I can use to enhance technology transfer to people? The project should be well planned guided by the ASSURE model. - Quora

response.answer_text: How about doing a project on ideas to help the elderly to understand technology transfer. You could devise some simple instructions/diagrams to help in the transfer of for example, camera download to computer, sat nav connection for updating, and many others. Keep it simple, with clear instructions for a person who needs large print, and ‘easy to read’ diagrams. You would need to research various pieces of equipment and connections etc and make it as foolproof as possible. Think of someone who is not ;computer literate, and would need to buy the appropriate connections etc. Tell them exactly what they need and where they might find it. You could include a glossary of technical terms, jargon, etc..explaining what each means in plain English…
